name: Veo 3.1
tagline: Bring stories to life with stunningly real visuals
description: We’re rolling out Veo 3.1, our updated video generation model, alongside improved creative controls for filmmakers, storytellers, and developers - many of them with audio.

name: Outchat AI
tagline: Launch and monetize your own branded AI chat
description: Create, brand, and monetize AI chats with Outchat. From setup to payments, everything you need to build your AI business in one platform.

name: Paritydeals
tagline: Flexible billing for AI & SaaS
description: Your pricing strategy shouldn't be limited by your codebase. ParityDeals decouples them. A simple SDK handles complex billing for developers, while your GTM team gets a dashboard to launch, test, and iterate pricing models in minutes—without engineering help

name: Relace Repos
tagline: GitHub for Agents
description: Repos is a source control product co-optimized with our suite of fast, specialized coding models. It's git compatible, high throughput, and has built-in codebase retrieval.

name: AI Mode by Dappier
tagline: An Answer Page for your site, with built-in monetization
description: Conversations are the new paradigm. Get in on AI-enabled ads. AI mode by Dappier gives you Perplexity for your site, in a box. Let users get answers driven by your content, monetized with conversational agentic ads.

name: Lazy for Notion
tagline: One ⌘ shortcut to capture anything straight to Notion
description: Meet the Lazy way to capture — designed for speed and to keep you in the zone: - One shortcut to take notes instantly + leveraging AI from anywhere - All the power of a beautiful markdown editor in a command-line interface - Understands the context you’re in

name: Basalt Agents
tagline: Evaluate AI workflows and reach 99% AI quality.
description: Basalt, #1 AI observability tool for teams, is launching its brand new Agent Builder : prototype, test, and deploy complex AI flows composed of multiple prompts, and run them through a dataset of scenarios.

name: Snap
tagline: Instant usability testing with AI personas
description: Snap lets you run instant usability tests with AI personas. Drop in a prototype or website, and your custom AI personas will test them like real users. Get results in minutes with transcripts, recordings, and actionable recommendations.

name: Apparency 3.0
tagline: The app that opens Mac apps
description: Right-click any macOS app to reveal extensive details: contents, versions, components, document types, and extensions. View security info (Gatekeeper, notarization, App Sandbox, signatures), browse entitlements, and inspect Info.plist and frameworks.

name: Zoho SalesIQ Nova '25
tagline: Smarter tools to accelerate your growth
description: Check out Zoho SalesIQ's latest release, Nova ’25—25+ features and enhancements across Zobot, GenAI, messaging channel, workflows, integrations, and more.

name: Pressmaster.ai V4
tagline: AI that turns your thinking into authentic content
description: Amplify your intelligence with the world’s first AI for cognitive amplification. Transform your thoughts into powerful communication and influence. Get a fully agentic social media team that builds your authority 24/7 while staying true to your voice and brand

name: PDF Vector
tagline: AI-Powered Document Processing for Developers & No-Coders
description: PDF Vector provides battle-tested APIs to parse PDFs/Word docs, ask questions, extract structured data, and access millions of academic papers. Start free with 100 credits, integrate in minutes. Perfect for AI apps, research tools, and automation workflows.

name: Tufa
tagline: Your all-in-one social media marketing platform
description: 🚀 Spend less time creating and more time growing. Tufa generates, designs, and schedules on-brand social content in seconds — all in your brand’s voice. Create, edit, and publish everything in one simple, AI-powered workspace.

name: resynced.io
tagline: Easy two-way data sync between your apps
description: Stop copy-pasting between apps. resynced.io automatically syncs data between Notion, Google Sheets, HubSpot, monday.com and more. Set up in 3 clicks, runs reliably in background. Perfect for teams tired of manual data entry.

name: B2B Request a Quote for WooCommerce
tagline: Let customers request quotes and negotiate bulk pricing
description: Let customers request quotes with custom pricing for any product. Hide prices, send professional PDF quotes, negotiate deals, and instantly convert quotes to orders. Perfect for B2B, wholesale, and bulk sales with a drag-and-drop form builder.

name: RedPill
tagline: The VPN for your AI.
description: Redpill delivers AI privacy by design. All workloads execute in secure hardware enclaves — every LLM query comes with a cryptographic proof so you never have to trust us blindly. Integrate easily via our simple SDK / API.

name: Youtube Summary
tagline: Summarize YouTube videos of any size in under 30sec for free
description: After 18 months, we decided to revamp Youtube Summary and make it free, for all.

name: VEIL: Smart Context-Aware Privacy
tagline: Strong protection where it counts seamless browsing anywhere
description: VEIL (Virtual Enhanced Identity Layer) is a context-aware privacy extension. Unlike others that treat all sites the same, VEIL adapts protection so your bank gets stronger security while blogs stay usable. Built to fix privacy gaps.

name: Redo My Site
tagline: Migrate any website to Astro project
description: Turn any website into a fast, static Astro project. Paste a URL → get clean, reusable components with Tailwind in a GitHub repo. Own the code, no subscriptions.

name: Media Notes
tagline: Manage your posts on the media
description: Media Notes:The all-in-one marketing workspace for Mac. Manage drafts, photos, and videos in one place, tag content by platform or date, schedule posts, and track your performance with smart insights. Stay organized, post on time, and boost your marketing flow
